short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Override the new tab page with a minimal clock

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I was looking for a minimal new tab extension.
Found none so I coded one myself.

This extension replaces your new tab with a dark page and a clock.
No options, no settings.

For feedbacks, ideas and insults -> hello@manuelmoreale.com
